main event: A radar-detected object was observed by a Navy P2V aircraft over the ocean, initially tracked at 3,700 feet and 145 knots. The object then accelerated to a maximum speed of 2,000 knots, reversed direction, and sped away at a distance of 80 miles in a matter of seconds.
interesting points: The object was initially tracked on radar at a height of 3,700 feet and a speed of 145 knots.
The object then accelerated to a maximum speed of 2,000 knots.
After approaching to within 2 miles, the object reversed direction and sped away at a distance of 80 miles in a matter of seconds.
No visual contact was made with the object.
The object was lost on radar at a range of 350 miles.
sighted object: a white object detected on radar
